settings.text: If you are unsatisfied with your purchase of a new Product that you purchased on vidlogix.com, you have 30 days from the date of purchase to notify Vidlogix and request a refund of the purchase price. To qualify for a refund from Vidlogix, you must meet all of the conditions of this Return & Refund Policy. If you wish to exchange an item, you will need to initiate a return for your original purchase, and make a separate purchase for the item you wish to receive instead.

settings.title: Return shipping is on PayPal when you checkout with PayPal.
settings.text: If you aren’t happy with your order, PayPal will provide a free return shipping label or refund the cost of sending it back on eligible purchases.

settings.title: Exclusions apply
settings.text: The following brands are noncancelable and nonreturnable: Aiphone, Bose Pro, Comelit, Dophigo, Hanwha, Hikvision, JBL Pro, Louroe, Optex, Rachio, Samsung, Sony, TP-Link, Yamaha.

settings.title: Qualifications
settings.text:
• A Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) must be requested from Vidlogix’s customer service team within 30 days of the date on which you purchased the Product.
  • To request an RMA, submit your request via customer self-serve returns.
  • Vidlogix must receive the returned Product within 14 days after an RMA number has been issued. An assigned RMA number is valid for 14 days only and will expire on the 15th day after the date of issuance, at which time any returned Product will be refused.
  • The entire Product and any accessories originally included with the Product you purchased must be included with your return.
  • Vidlogix may require that you furnish proof of purchase details to obtain an RMA.
  • Returned product(s) must be working and in good physical condition (not physically broken or damaged), and in either its original packaging or packaging providing an equal degree of protection. Pack your items carefully since they are still your items until we have verified their functionality and physical condition. Do not deface or treat the item box as the shipping box. Ensure that any previous shipping labels or other markings have been removed or covered completely. A valid RMA number must be included along with your returned Product(s).

settings.title: Terms & Conditions
settings.text:
• To ensure successful delivery, you must ship the product to the address provided to you via the RMA process. Vidlogix will not be responsible for returns that are not sent to the correct address or otherwise do not comply with the requirements provided via the RMA process.
  • Vidlogix will deduct return shipping costs from the amount of your refund.
  • You shall assume all risk of loss or damage to the product while in transit to Vidlogix. If you return a Product to Vidlogix (a) without a valid RMA from Vidlogix or (b) without all parts and accessories included in the original package or (c) otherwise not in compliance with this Returns and Refunds Policy and the RMA provided to you, Vidlogix retains the right to either (1) refuse the return or (2) deduct from the refund paid to you a non-refundable restocking fee equal to the higher of (ii) twenty (20) percent of the original price of the Product or (ii) the retail value of the missing parts or accessories.
  • Refunds will be processed within 2 weeks of Vidlogix's receipt of the Product.
  • Refunds will be reimbursed via the original form of purchase. If you purchased the Product using a credit or debit card, the refund will be sent to the card-issuing bank within the time frame above; timing of when the refunded amount is reflected on your account depends on your card issuers processing time.

settings.title: Warranty Policy
settings.text:
All items sold by Vidlogix are warranted solely by the manufacturer (Vendor). All items needing repair should be sent to the Vendor directly for service. Vidlogix is not liable if the Vendor fails to perform warranty service.

Vidlogix is not responsible for personal data or items left in returned merchandise. Any electronics containing user profile data must be either factory reset or password unlocked before sending back to Vidlogix for return.

Vidlogix will not be responsible for any consequential or incidental damage resulting from the sale or use of any merchandise purchased from us. Vidlogix’s liability is limited to the monetary value of the merchandise. Claims for missing items or items damaged in transit must be received within two business days of receipt of merchandise.

There is no implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose on any item sold by Vidlogix.

settings.title: Return instructions
settings.text:
RMA numbers are required for all returns. RMA numbers are valid for 12 days. Delinquent and unauthorized returns may be returned at the sender's expense.

In 1 business day you’ll hear back from us with your RMA number.
settings.text2:
Pack your items carefully since they are still your items until we have verified their functionality and physical condition. Please do not deface or treat the item box as the shipping box.

Any electronics containing user profile data must be either factory reset or password unlocked before sending back to Vidlogix for return.

Ensure that there are no other tracking labels attached to your package. Remove or cover any hazardous materials markings if you are shipping a non-hazardous item.

Affix the mailing label squarely onto the address side of the parcel, covering up any previous delivery address and barcode without overlapping any adjacent side.

Choose the return ship method most convenient to you, but we strongly suggest choosing a carrier that will provide you tracking information and insurance. Unfortunately, we cannot be responsible for your return until it is received at our distribution center.

settings.title: Important details
settings.text:
Refundable – Factory sealed, shrink-wrapped, unopened, unused, and undamaged items in the original packaging are refundable within 30 days. Upon inspection, damaged/defective items will be replaced (subject to availability). Vidlogix does not issue advanced replacements. The fastest way to receive a replacement is to make a new order. Damaged goods or shortages must be reported within two (2) days of receipt of goods. Our associates cannot replace a missing part or piece from an item.

Non-refundable – The money-back guarantee excludes gardens, air purifiers, kitchen appliances, personal protective equipment (PPE), hard disk drives (HDD), software, televisions, and unsealed (inner & outer seals), clearance, and special order items. You should send damaged/defective items to the manufacturer for service. Vidlogix is not liable if the manufacturer fails to perform warranty service.

Return shipping fees – Original order shipping charges, if applicable, are not refundable on correctly shipped orders. If you have received a damaged, defective or incorrect item, please get in touch with us, and we will arrange the return. If you wish to return your item for another reason, e.g., the item is unsuitable, please arrange postage yourself. Vidlogix can issue one (1) return shipping label per order for a flat fee of $12 (< 10 lbs). If you opt to receive a Vidlogix gift card instead of a refund for your return, we’ll waive the return shipping fee! Return shipping fees are deducted from your refund.

Restocking fees – All returned merchandise must be in the same condition as sold, with all included accessories. If the state differs, we reserve the right to charge a 20% restocking fee.

Undeliverable – If an order is refused or returned to us due to inaccurate or incorrect address information or because it was declined or undeliverable, Vidlogix reserves the right to retain the original shipping/handling fee and to charge the payment method originally used for costs we incur related to the return of the undeliverable packages or merchandise to us.
